name: King of Bali
description: “King of Bali” is an adult comedic harem dating-sim filled with hilarious jokes and loveable characters. How many people can you charm in Bali?
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista or higher Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Vista or higher Processor: 2.0 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
